description: Platform load and consumption metrics for cloud/GPU providers â€” requests per minute, token throughput, image generation rates, and per-model breakdown

panels.description: Average number of successful Enter API requests per day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(DISTINCT request_id) / GREATEST(1, uniqExact(toDate(start_time))), 0) AS daily_requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300

panels.title: Enter Avg Daily Requests

panels.description: Average Enter API requests per minute.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(DISTINCT request_id) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('minute', min(start_time), max(start_time))), 1) AS avg_rpm
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300

panels.title: Enter Avg RPM

panels.description: Maximum Enter API requests in any single 1-minute window.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT max(rpm) AS peak_rpm_1min
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(start_time) AS ts,
    count(DISTINCT request_id) AS rpm
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  GROUP BY ts
)

panels.title: Enter Peak RPM (1-min)

panels.description: Maximum 15-minute rolling average of Enter API per-minute request counts.

targets.rawSql:
WITH per_min AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(start_time) AS ts,
    count(DISTINCT request_id) AS rpm
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  GROUP BY ts
)
SELECT round(max(rolling_rpm), 1) AS peak_rpm_15min
FROM (
  SELECT avg(rpm) OVER (ORDER BY ts ROWS BETWEEN 14 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS rolling_rpm
  FROM per_min
)

panels.title: Enter Peak RPM (15-min)

panels.description: Ratio of Enter API peak 1-minute RPM to average RPM. Indicates burstiness.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT round(peak_rpm / GREATEST(1, avg_rpm), 2) AS peak_to_avg
FROM (
  SELECT
    max(rpm) AS peak_rpm,
    avg(rpm) AS avg_rpm
  FROM (
    SELECT
      toStartOfMinute(start_time) AS ts,
      count(DISTINCT request_id) AS rpm
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
      AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    GROUP BY ts
  )
)

panels.title: Enter Peak/Avg Ratio

panels.description: Average number of successful Legacy API requests per day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(*) / GREATEST(1, uniqExact(toDate(timestamp))), 0) AS daily_requests
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Avg Daily Requests

panels.description: Average Legacy API requests per minute.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(*) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('minute', min(timestamp), max(timestamp))), 1) AS avg_rpm
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Avg RPM

panels.description: Maximum Legacy API requests in any single 1-minute window.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT max(rpm) AS peak_rpm_1min
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS ts,
    count(*) AS rpm
  FROM text_events
  WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
    AND response_status = 'success'
  GROUP BY ts
)

panels.title: Legacy Peak RPM (1-min)

panels.description: Maximum 15-minute rolling average of Legacy API per-minute request counts.

targets.rawSql:
WITH per_min AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS ts,
    count(*) AS rpm
  FROM text_events
  WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
    AND response_status = 'success'
  GROUP BY ts
)
SELECT round(max(rolling_rpm), 1) AS peak_rpm_15min
FROM (
  SELECT avg(rpm) OVER (ORDER BY ts ROWS BETWEEN 14 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS rolling_rpm
  FROM per_min
)

panels.title: Legacy Peak RPM (15-min)

panels.description: Ratio of Legacy API peak 1-minute RPM to average RPM. Indicates burstiness.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT round(peak_rpm / GREATEST(1, avg_rpm), 2) AS peak_to_avg
FROM (
  SELECT
    max(rpm) AS peak_rpm,
    avg(rpm) AS avg_rpm
  FROM (
    SELECT
      toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS ts,
      count(*) AS rpm
    FROM text_events
    WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
      AND response_status = 'success'
    GROUP BY ts
  )
)

panels.title: Legacy Peak/Avg Ratio

panels.description: Requests per minute over time, normalized by granularity bucket size.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS rpm
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: RPM Over Time

panels.description: Requests per minute broken down by workload type (image, text, audio).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  event_type,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS rpm
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY ts, event_type
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: RPM by Event Type

panels.description: Requests per minute broken down by cloud provider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  model_provider_used AS provider,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS rpm
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND model_provider_used != ''
  AND model_provider_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY ts, provider
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: RPM by Provider

panels.description: Token throughput for text models: input, output, and total tokens per second, normalized by granularity bucket.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  SUM(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS input_tok_per_sec,
  SUM(token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS output_tok_per_sec,
  SUM(
    token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached +
    token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image
  ) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS total_tok_per_sec
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Token Throughput Over Time

panels.description: Average input tokens processed per second across the selected time range.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(SUM(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached)
    / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('second', min(start_time), max(start_time))), 0) AS avg_input_tok_sec
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'

panels.title: Avg Input tok/s

panels.description: Average output tokens generated per second across the selected time range.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(SUM(token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image)
    / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('second', min(start_time), max(start_time))), 0) AS avg_output_tok_sec
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'

panels.title: Avg Output tok/s

panels.description: Average total tokens (input + output) per second across the selected time range.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(SUM(
    token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached +
    token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image
  ) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('second', min(start_time), max(start_time))), 0) AS total_tok_sec
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'

panels.title: Avg Total tok/s

panels.description: Peak total tokens per second observed in any single 1-minute window.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT round(max(total_tok_sec), 0) AS peak_total_tok_sec
FROM (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(start_time) AS ts,
    SUM(
      token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached +
      token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image
    ) / 60.0 AS total_tok_sec
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND event_type = 'generate.text'
  GROUP BY ts
)

panels.title: Peak Total tok/s

panels.description: Total token throughput (tok/s) broken down by model, showing which models drive the most token volume.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  model_used,
  SUM(
    token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached +
    token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image
  ) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS tok_per_sec
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY ts, model_used
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Token Throughput by Model

panels.description: Images generated per minute over time, normalized by granularity bucket size.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS images_per_min
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.image'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Images/min Over Time

panels.description: Image generation rate broken down by model, showing which image models drive the most GPU demand.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  model_used,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS images_per_min
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.image'
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY ts, model_used
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Images/min by Model

panels.description: Top 10 image models by total volume in the selected time range.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  model_used AS model,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS total_images
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.image'
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY model
ORDER BY total_images DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Image Models by Volume

panels.description: Summary table showing each model's request volume, throughput, token characteristics, and cost.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  model_used AS Model,
  model_provider_used AS Provider,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS Requests,
  round(count(DISTINCT request_id) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('minute', min(start_time), max(start_time))), 2) AS Avg_RPM,
  round(avg(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached), 0) AS Avg_Input_Tokens,
  round(avg(token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image), 0) AS Avg_Output_Tokens,
  round(SUM(total_cost), 2) AS Total_Cost
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY model_used, model_provider_used
ORDER BY Requests DESC

panels.title: Per-Model Summary

panels.description: Request volume over time broken down by model (stacked).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  model_used,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'undefined'
GROUP BY ts, model_used
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Request Volume by Model

panels.description: Average response time (start to end) by event type over time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  event_type,
  avg(date_diff('millisecond', start_time, end_time)) AS avg_response_ms
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND end_time > start_time
GROUP BY ts, event_type
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Avg Response Time by Event Type

panels.description: Average input and output tokens per text request over time. Indicates request complexity trends.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  round(avg(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_prompt_audio + token_count_prompt_image + token_count_prompt_cached), 0) AS avg_input_tokens,
  round(avg(token_count_completion_text + token_count_completion_reasoning + token_count_completion_audio + token_count_completion_image), 0) AS avg_output_tokens
FROM generation_event
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND event_type = 'generate.text'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Avg Tokens per Request Over Time

panels.description: Percentage of requests that hit cache, by event type.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  event_type,
  round(countIf(cache_hit = true) * 100.0 / GREATEST(1, count()), 2) AS cache_hit_pct
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY event_type
ORDER BY cache_hit_pct DESC

panels.title: Cache Hit Rate by Event Type

panels.description: Average successful legacy API requests per day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(*) / GREATEST(1, uniqExact(toDate(timestamp))), 0) AS daily_requests
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Avg Daily Requests

panels.description: Average legacy API requests per minute.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(count(*) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('minute', min(timestamp), max(timestamp))), 1) AS avg_rpm
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Avg RPM

panels.description: Average legacy API token throughput (input/output/total tok/s).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(SUM(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_completion_text)
    / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('second', min(timestamp), max(timestamp))), 0) AS total_tok_sec
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Avg Total tok/s

panels.description: Total legacy API cost over the selected period.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  round(SUM(cost), 2) AS total_cost
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'

panels.title: Legacy Total Cost

panels.description: Legacy API requests per minute over time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', timestamp) AS ts,
  count(*) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS rpm
FROM text_events
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND response_status = 'success'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Legacy RPM Over Time

panels.description: Legacy API RPM broken down by provider.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', timestamp) AS ts,
  provider,
  count(*) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 1
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 60
      WHEN 'day' THEN 1440
      WHEN 'week' THEN 10080
      WHEN 'month' THEN 43200
    END AS rpm
FROM text_events
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND response_status = 'success'
  AND provider != ''
  AND provider != 'unknown'
GROUP BY ts, provider
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Legacy RPM by Provider

panels.description: Legacy API token throughput (input/output/total tok/s) over time.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', timestamp) AS ts,
  SUM(token_count_prompt_text) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS input_tok_per_sec,
  SUM(token_count_completion_text) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS output_tok_per_sec,
  SUM(token_count_prompt_text + token_count_completion_text) /
    CASE '$granularity'
      WHEN 'minute' THEN 60
      WHEN 'hour' THEN 3600
      WHEN 'day' THEN 86400
      WHEN 'week' THEN 604800
      WHEN 'month' THEN 2592000
    END AS total_tok_per_sec
FROM text_events
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND response_status = 'success'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts

panels.title: Legacy Token Throughput Over Time

panels.description: Legacy API per-model summary: requests, RPM, avg tokens, and cost.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  model_used AS Model,
  provider AS Provider,
  count(*) AS Requests,
  round(count(*) / GREATEST(1, dateDiff('minute', min(timestamp), max(timestamp))), 2) AS Avg_RPM,
  round(avg(token_count_prompt_text), 0) AS Avg_Input_Tokens,
  round(avg(token_count_completion_text), 0) AS Avg_Output_Tokens,
  round(SUM(cost), 2) AS Total_Cost
FROM text_events
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp < $__toTime
  AND response_status = 'success'
  AND model_used != ''
  AND model_used != 'unknown'
GROUP BY model_used, provider
ORDER BY Requests DESC

panels.title: Legacy Per-Model Summary

title: Platform Load & Consumption
